name: There's Always Space for Love
description:
A dating simulator on a space ship.

Good luck!

Made in 48 hours for a game jam.

Credits

  • Ivan Berlin (Midnight Shadow) - Composer - linktr.ee/midnightshadowmusic
  • Luke Csermak - Character Art & Animations  - Twitter @ SmudgedOut

Most of the game is room written.
